title: These are the Best iPhone 13 & iPhone 13 Mini Deals: Where to buy the Apple iPhone 13?
content:
The iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Mini are here. The phones are an incremental upgrade over the iPhone 12 series and are powered by Apple’s new A15 Bionic chip. The company is releasing the two phones in six color options and three storage variants. It’s also ditched the 64GB model, and instead, the 128GB model

The post These are the Best iPhone 13 & iPhone 13 Mini Deals: Where to buy the Apple iPhone 13? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Looking for the best iPhone 13 deals? We have picked the best places to buy the new iPhone 13, including the Apple Online Store.
